short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A dismissible prompt to consume social media with an intention in mind.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever gone to a website with the intention of looking up something specific, only to find yourself minutes or hours later scrolling through an endless stream of mindless content?

This app doesn't block your ability to visit social media websites, it gently nudges you to think about why you are there, and to be mindful of how you spend your time.

Let us know what you think!
